title: General
stimulusHtml: 1 point for identifying each of the following elements (3 points maximum): 2nd person, pluperfect, subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)
descriptions: Student scores 1 of the following elements: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)
Student scores 2 of the following elements: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)
Student scores 3 of the following elements: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)
